stories.title: On 2022-04-05, the default branch will be renamed from “master” to “main”

stories.text:
Hello HN commmunity, happy to announce the launch of AutoFloApp

It is the simplest way to automate your Testing

Our aim is to 1. Enable manual testers to automate, 2. Shorten the journey of a testcase to be automated, 3. Accessible to everyone and 4. Easy to maintain and develop.

We are a web application which provides below functionalities:

1. Shorten your testing life cycle through automation 2. No Code platform to enable Manual testers to automate 3. Remove dependency on any specific coding skills 4. No infra required for script development and execution 5. Increase scope of testing in same timelines by enabling test automation

We are in our Beta Trial phase and are already being used by global companies such as InfraGuard.io, who have reduced their automation script development time by 80% and testing execution time Testing time by close to 90% after using AutoFloApp.

You can sign up on our website - https://www.autofloapp-login.com/

Here is the short video to help you understand the tool - https://youtu.be/vpJfDPuCDbE

We have a 1 month Free Trial for all our Beta Customers. Do contact us on contact@autofloapp.com, if this fits your requirements, and we will circle back to schedule a demo.

stories.text: Hello, at my current company we have a really great designer that sadly doesn't have a formal training in web development. This makes it really hard for him to develop usable and responsive interfaces for our products. What I'm wondering is: is there some conceptual framework or a straight up product that would allow him to pay more attention on how elements behave with different widths, different content lengths and such? Something that would avoid the more basic errors of translation from SVG to HTML/CSS? Thanks
